column1: text
These wireless earbuds have amazing sound quality and the battery lasts all day.
I returned this office chair immediately. The armrests wobbled, the lumbar support was nonexistent, and the cushion was rock hard.
Bought the cordless vacuum on sale and wow, the suction power is impressive even on carpet. Best impulse buy in a while.
The resistance bands snapped on my second workout. Completely unsafe.
Oppenheimer was a masterclass in tension and storytelling. Cillian Murphy deserved every award he got.
I expected nothing from that Netflix original and somehow it still disappointed me.
Everything Everywhere All at Once is chaotic and brilliant. It made me laugh and sob within the same scene.
The villain had zero motivation, the love interest was a cardboard cutout, and the climax made no sense.
just got the new airpods pro and wow the noise canceling is insane
can't believe they canceled my flight with zero notice. never flying with them again
the customer service at target was actually really helpful today
worst hotel experience of my life. mold in the bathroom. actual mold
Absolutely loved the ramen here. Rich broth, tender pork, and perfectly cooked noodles.
The waiter was rude, the music was too loud, and the pasta was overcooked. Never again.
The chocolate cake from this bakery is hands down the best dessert I have ever tasted.
Our delivery order arrived 90 minutes late and the fries were completely soggy.
Best task manager I've ever used. Syncs perfectly across all my devices and the UI is clean.
The banking app logs me out every five minutes. Entering my password twelve times a day is infuriating.
The streaming app has an incredible library and the recommendation algorithm actually understands my taste.
App crashes every time I try to upload a photo. Three updates and the bug is still there.
